Klasse ChatService

java.lang.Object
com.spirit.application.service.ChatService
@Service @Transactional public class ChatService extends Object
Service class for handling chat messages and user interactions.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • ChatService

      @Autowired public ChatService(ChatMessageRepository chatMessageRepository, UserRepository userRepository, ChatHelper chatHelper)

  • Methodendetails

    • addMessageListener

      public void addMessageListener(Consumer<ChatMessageDTO> listener)
      Adds a message listener to be notified of new messages.
      Parameter:
      listener - the listener to be added

    • removeMessageListener

      public void removeMessageListener(Consumer<ChatMessageDTO> listener)
      Removes a message listener.
      Parameter:
      listener - the listener to be removed

    • sendMessage

      public ChatMessage sendMessage(long senderId, long receiverId, String content)
      Sends a chat message from one user to another.
      Parameter:
      senderId - the ID of the sender
      receiverId - the ID of the receiver
      content - the message content
      Gibt zurück:
      the saved chat message

    • getChatHistory

      public List<ChatMessage> getChatHistory(long userId, long otherUserId)
      Retrieves the chat history between two users.
      Parameter:
      userId - the ID of the first user
      otherUserId - the ID of the second user
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of chat messages between the two users
